Articles.Content:
Does KSP run better in Mac OSX El Capitan than in Yosemite? Kern Protection failures are happenning in roughly the same place and conditions in 1.1 as they were in 1.0.5.

Of course if there is a way to fix Kern Protection Failures, that would be great.
I haven't had any problem with it, however I never did in the first place.
never played KSP much on either, but haven't seen serious problems on either either.
Yosemite 10.4.4 here and had no problems with any crashes so far in 1.1
